7100.ingredientInfo: Smash Earth Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to find Rock Fruit!

7101.ingredientInfo: Smash Lightning Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to find Shock Fruit!

7103.ingredientInfo: Smash Fire Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to find Flame Fruit!

7104.ingredientInfo: Smash Ice Blossoms in the Ninjago Monastery to find Frost Fruit!

7130.ingredientInfo: Smash Bamboo in the Ninjago Monastery to find Bamboo Bites!

7133.ingredientInfo: Smash rocks in the Ninjago Caverns to find Onyx Gems!
